first corpus.from sentence: In this work , we make available the first corpus 1 for sarcasm detection that has both unbalanced and self - annotated labels and does not consist of short text snippets from Twitter 2 .

more than a million examples.from sentence: With more than a million examples of sarcastic statements , each provided with author , topic , and contex information , the dataset exceeds all previous sarcasm corpora by an order of magnitude in size .
